author: fhanik
msg: Make sure we check if the attachment is null

author: ate
msg: Making the portlet2-api module standalone and independent of the Pluto parent pom as it really isn't nor shouldn't be.
This now makes it possible to distribute the portlet-api-2.0 through the standard maven (ibiblio) remote repository.
As its the formal JSR-286 released api and not changed thereafter, it doesn't need a "release" as such, just be conveniently made available from the maven-2 repo.

author: zshao
